=== Placeholder textures ===
{{HistoryTable
|{{HistoryLine|java}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.0.0|dev=Beta 1.9 Prerelease 2|{{Pixel image|Placeholder Effect (texture) JE1 BE1.png|36px}} <samp>inventory.png</samp> now has seven identical placeholder markers for future effect textures.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.9|dev=15w49a|All seven placeholder textures have now been exhausted by added effect icons.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.13|dev=18w14a|{{Pixel image|Placeholder Effect (texture) JE2.png|36px}} Added eleven identical placeholder textures to <samp>inventory.png</samp> as places for potential future effect icons.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.14|dev=18w43a|All placeholder effect textures were removed in this version, despite not being used up. They still exist in Programmer Art and in 18w47a one was used by [[Bad Omen]] when Programmer Art was active.}}
|{{HistoryLine|||dev=19w08a|With the splitting of effect textures, placeholder effect squares are completely absent{{verify|or are they just not used in programmer art?}} from both default resource packs.}}
}}
